text: WLXB (98.9 FM) is a radio station airing a Contemporary Christian music format. Licensed to Bethel, North Carolina, United States, it serves the Greenville-New Bern area. ==History== WLXB went on the air as WDRP on 1987-08-04. On 1990-09-03, the station changed its call sign to WVSG, on 1990-10-01 to WDRP, on 2002-09-01 to WIAM-FM, on 2004-05-17 to WNBR-FM, and on 2015-04-27 to WLXB. From 2004 to 2015, WNBR-FM played classic country as "The Bear", simulcasting WNBB. ==References== ==External links== * Category:K-Love radio stations Category:Contemporary Christian radio stations in the United States LXB Category:Radio stations established in 1989 Category:1989 establishments in North Carolina Category:Educational Media Foundation radio stations LXB
